citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm;
1:46 pm on 19-SEP-18.
Upon arrival at the facility knocked on the door. Attempted to contact by phone and left a message on the number
provided. Left a business card on front door. Departed facility at 1:00 pm. Returned to facility at 1:46 pm.
Knocked on the door. Attempted to contact by phone and left message,

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm;
1:46 pm on 19-SEP-18.
Upon arrival at the facility knocked on the door.  Attempted to contact by phone and left  a message on the number
provided.  Left a business card on front door.  Departed facility at 1:00 pm.  Returned to facility at 1:46 pm. 
Knocked on the door.  Attempted to contact by phone and left message,
